title: Intern – Group Corporate Planning and Strategy

jd: Part or full qualification in CIMA/ ACCA/ CFA or following Bachelor’s Degree approved by UGC infinance discipline

If you are interested, please apply via email (nipunee.namoda@hayleysadvantis.com) by mentioning the position applied for in the subject line of the email.
